title: Brand New Upcoming Apartment for Sale in Colombo 3
details:

Located on a mid-level floor with amazing views of the sea to the West and Fort to the North. Also, a very spacious apartment that has a floor area of 1845 sq.ft

The Investment for this luxurious apartment is just : 65 Million LKR
